hypothesis: Impaired immune responses in the elderly to infection or vaccination reflects dysregulation of immunoregulatory pathways and metabolic pathways, which work in concert to orchestrate an effective immune response in young healthy individuals.
objectives: To measure the antibody responses to Trivalent Inactivated Influenza vaccination in young and aged human subjects - specifically neutralizing antibodies and binding isotypes
